instruction: Generate a speech to encourage people to stay environmentally friendly.
output: We all have a responsibility to make sure that we are preserving our planet for future generations. By choosing to use renewable energy sources and practice sustainable living, we can reduce our impact on the environment and make sure that our descendants will still be able to enjoy it. It may be inconvenient at times, but it is necessary if we want to make sure that our planet is livable for years to come. Let's all do our best to live sustainably and be environmentally friendly!
